articles.title: Will Suryakumar Yadav Be Dropped After 2 Ducks In 2 ODIs? Rohit Sharma's Clear Reply - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav was once again dismissed for a duck during the second India-Australia ODI encounter.
articles.content: Visakhapatnam:India captain Rohit Sharma on Sunday said right-handed batter Suryakumar Yadav, who has struggled to find his mojo in one-day cricket after a dazzling run in T20 format, knows that he h… [+3019 chars]

articles.description: Horrific: Millions of dead, rotten fish wash ashore river near Australian town
articles.content: Millions of dead and decaying fish have choked up a long length of river in a remote  Australian town of Menindee in New South Wales. Multiple videos are going viral on social media showing boats sli… [+1989 chars]

articles.title: 43-year-old Rohan Bopanna becomes oldest Indian Wells champion - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Tennis News: India's Rohan Bopanna became the oldest ATP Masters 1000 champion when he and his Australian partner Matt Ebden claimed the men's doubles crown at the
articles.content:
What a match. What a reaction.Congratulations to our men's doubles champs @mattebden and @rohanbopanna! https://t.co/4ewG92fupj
